channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Extended -- The Ultimate WordPress Toolkit – WP Extended

item.title: CVE-2024-37259|2024-07-22T09:04:54.245Z -- wp%20extended -- the%20ultimate%20wordpress%20toolkit%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20extended
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Extended The Ultimate WordPress Toolkit – WP Extended allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects The Ultimate WordPress Toolkit – WP Extended: from n/a through 2.4.7.
